title: Authors and Citation
Authors and Citation
text: Manuel Spínola (2023). crgeo: Costa Rica climate change. R package version 0.1.0. Available https://github.com/ManuelSpinola/crcc.
code: @Manual{,   title = {cacc: Central America climate change},   author = {Manuel Spínola},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   year = {2023},   url = {https://github.com/ManuelSpinola/crcc}, }

title: cacc: Central America climate change
text: goal cacc provides geospatial data Central America climate change analysis.

title: cacc: Central America climate change
text: can install development version cacc GitHub :

title: cacc: Central America climate change
code: ## basic example code library(cacc) library(tidyverse) library(sf) library(stars) ggplot() +   geom_stars(data = ca_inm_cm4_8_ssp126_2021_2040[,,,1]) +   scale_fill_viridis_c(name = "Annual Mean Temperature", option = "C", na.value = "transparent", direction = -1) +   theme_minimal() +   coord_equal()

what: Bioclimatic variables of continental Central America (2021 - 2040) — ca_inm_cm4_8_ssp126_2021_2040
title: Bioclimatic variables of continental Central America (2021 - 2040) — ca_inm_cm4_8_ssp126_2021_2040
text: Bioclimatic variables downscaled calibrated CMIP6 climate data projected future climates continental Central America (2021 - 2040) Includes 3 GCMs (General Circulation Models), INM_CM4_8, MPI-ESM1-2-HR UKESM1-0-LL, four SSPs (Shared Socioeconomic Pathways), ssp126, ssp245, ssp370 ssp585. Resolution 0.5 minutes degree (~1km).
